item.title: Paralympians achieve legendary status but who was there to witness history in the making ?
item.author: Felix Editor,Beng Tan,
item.description: The partying and fireworks on a wet, rainy night in and around the Maracanã Stadium marked the grand finale of the biggest sporting showpiece of the year and brought a happy ending to two weeks full of sweat, grit, determination, tension, sportsmanship, joy, tears, more sportsmanship and the very …
